verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ <WH5329> lam-natz-Tze-acho the chief Musician לִבְנֵי־ <WH1121> [Tliv-nei-for the sons קֹ֑רַח <WH7141> Ko-rach; of Korah עַֽל־ <WH5921> 'al- upon עֲלָמ֥וֹת <WH5961> a-la-Mot upon Alamoth שִֽׁיר׃ <WH7892> Shir. A Song אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> E-lo-Him God לָ֭נוּ La-nu מַחֲסֶ֣ה <WH4268> ma-cha-Seh [is] our refuge וָעֹ֑ז <WH5797> va-'Oz; and strength עֶזְרָ֥ה <WH5833> 'ez-Rah help בְ֝צָר֗וֹת <WH6869> ve-tza-Rot, in trouble נִמְצָ֥א <WH4672> nim-Tza present מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> me-'Od. a very

עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and כֵּ֣ן <WH3651> ken after that לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- we will not נִ֭ירָא <WH3372> Ni-ra Therefore will not we fear בְּהָמִ֣יר <WH4171> be-ha-Mir be removed אָ֑רֶץ <WH776> 'A-retz; though the earth וּבְמ֥וֹט <WH4131> u-ve-Mot be carried הָ֝רִ֗ים <WH2022> ha-Rim, and though the mountains בְּלֵ֣ב <WH3820> be-Lev into the midst יַמִּֽים׃ <WH3220> yam-Mim. of the sea

יֶהֱמ֣וּ <WH1993> ye-he-Mu thereof roar יֶחְמְר֣וּ <WH2560> yech-me-Ru [and] be troubled מֵימָ֑יו <WH4325> mei-Mav; [Though] the waters יִֽרְעֲשֽׁוּ־ <WH7493> yir-'a-shu- shake הָרִ֖ים <WH2022> ha-Rim [though] the mountains בְּגַאֲוָת֣וֹ <WH1346> be-ga-'a-va-To with the swelling סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Se-lah. thereof Selah

נָהָ֗ר <WH5104> na-Har, [There is] a river פְּלָגָ֗יו <WH6388> pe-la-Gav, the streams יְשַׂמְּח֥וּ <WH8055> ye-sam-me-Chu whereof shall make glad עִיר־ <WH5892> 'ir- the city אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> E-lo-Him; of God קְ֝דֹ֗שׁ <WH6918> ke-Dosh, the holy מִשְׁכְּנֵ֥י <WH4908> mish-ke-Nei [place] of the tabernacles עֶלְיֽוֹן׃ <WH5945> el-Yon. of the most High

אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> E-lo-Him God בְּ֭קִרְבָּהּ <WH7130> Be-kir-bah [is] in the midst בַּל־ <WH1077> bal- lest תִּמּ֑וֹט <WH4131> tim-Mot; of her she shall not be moved יַעְזְרֶ֥הָ <WH5826> ya'-ze-Re-ha shall help אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים <WH430> E-lo-Him, God לִפְנ֥וֹת <WH6437> lif-Not her [and that] right בֹּֽקֶר׃ <WH1242> Bo-ker. early

הָמ֣וּ <WH1993> ha-Mu raged ג֭וֹיִם <WH1471> Go-yim The heathen מָ֣טוּ <WH4131> Ma-tu were moved מַמְלָכ֑וֹת <WH4467> mam-la-Chot; the kingdoms נָתַ֥ן <WH5414> na-Tan he uttered בְּ֝קוֹל֗וֹ <WH6963> be-ko-Lo, his voice תָּמ֥וּג <WH4127> ta-Mug melted אָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> 'A-retz. the earth

יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh The LORD צְבָא֣וֹת <WH6635> tze-va-'ot of hosts עִמָּ֑נוּ <WH5973> 'im-Ma-nu; with מִשְׂגָּֽב־ <WH4869> mis-gav- [is] our refuge לָ֝נוּ La-nu אֱלֹהֵ֖י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei [is] with us the God יַעֲקֹ֣ב <WH3290> ya-'a-Ko of Jacob סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Se-lah. Selah

לְֽכוּ־ <WH1980> le-chu- Come חֲ֭זוּ <WH2372> Cha-zu behold מִפְעֲל֣וֹת <WH4659> mif-'a-Lot the works יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; of the LORD אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- Who שָׂ֖ם <WH7760> sam he hath made שַׁמּ֣וֹת <WH8047> sham-Mot what desolations בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> ba-'A-retz. in the earth

מַשְׁבִּ֥ית <WH7673> mash-Bit to cease מִלְחָמוֹת֮ <WH4421> mil-cha-mOt He maketh wars עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- against קְצֵ֪ה <WH7097> ke-Tzeh unto the end הָ֫אָ֥רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz of the earth קֶ֣שֶׁת <WH7198> Ke-shet the bow יְ֭שַׁבֵּר <WH7665> Ye-shab-ber he breaketh וְקִצֵּ֣ץ <WH7112> ve-kitz-Tzetz in sunder חֲנִ֑ית <WH2595> cha-Nit; the spear עֲ֝גָל֗וֹת <WH5699> a-ga-Lot, the chariot יִשְׂרֹ֥ף <WH8313> yis-Rof he burneth בָּאֵֽשׁ׃ <WH784> ba-'Esh. in the fire

הַרְפּ֣וּ <WH7503> har-Pu Be still וּ֭דְעוּ <WH3045> U-de-'u and know כִּי־ <WH3588> ki- that אָנֹכִ֣י <WH595> 'a-no-Chi I am אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> E-lo-Him; that I [am] God אָר֥וּם <WH7311> 'a-Rum I will be exalted בַּ֝גּוֹיִ֗ם <WH1471> bag-go-Yim, among the heathen אָר֥וּם <WH7311> 'a-Rum I will be exalted בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> ba-'A-retz. in the earth

יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh The LORD צְבָא֣וֹת <WH6635> tze-va-'ot of hosts עִמָּ֑נוּ <WH5973> 'im-Ma-nu; with מִשְׂגָּֽב־ <WH4869> mis-gav- [is] our refuge לָ֝נוּ La-nu אֱלֹהֵ֖י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei [is] with us the God יַעֲקֹ֣ב <WH3290> ya-'a-Ko of Jacob סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Se-lah. Selah
